cause.description:
The Energy Action Coalition and the Campus Climate Challenge are youth lead and youth run efforts to stop global warming.
The Challenge has helped students on over 500 campuses work for real policy change in their communities. Challenge organizers have also been instrumental in leading amazing community organizing and high profile national and international efforts to stop global warming.
Help support the youth organizers who are leading the movement to stop global warming. Its our future at stake and we are fighting to save it. All money given to the Challenge goes to support youth organizing to fight global warming. You can learn about the amazing Challenge organizers at: http://climatechallenge.org/staff
1. Climate policy must be scientifically based and reach 80% reductions by 2050.
2. Fossil fuels subsidies and investments must be shifted to renewables now.
3. We must ensure a just transition that improves and supports their physical, social and economic health of all people.
4. We must prioritize major reductions in total energy use through conservation and energy efficiency.
5. Energy policy should be made by people and for people, not by energy companies for energy companies.
cause.mission: Help fund youth organizing to stop global warming.
cause.name: F**king Stop It
